name: Too Many Marshmallows!
description:
Growing up, whenever I got stressed out, something that I always liked to too was make hot chocolate. It also may be important to note that I am one of those people who loves their hot chocolate to be FILLED TO THE BRIM with, you guessed it, MARSHMALLOWS!

So, Too Many Marshmallows! is basically the game version of getting stressed out and trying to put as many marshmallows in the hot chocolate as possible.
